recipes.label: Golden Eyes
recipes.startdescription: Behind my eyes, a sun. I need not look, for the truth is in me allready. I will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Silver Eyes
recipes.startdescription: Behind my eyes, a lamp. Ony truth withstands my gaze. I will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Amber Eyes
recipes.startdescription: Behind my eyes, a candle, and it's flickers reveal the true path forward. I may succeed.

recipes.label: Hallowed Insight
recipes.startdescription: Inside my skull, a door is shattered. The path is clear. I will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Deep Insight
recipes.startdescription: Inside my skull, a door stands open, and I know what is obscured or lost. I will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Creeping Insight
recipes.startdescription: Inside my skull, a door stands ajar, and sometimes insights slip through. I may find what I am looking for.
